sentences.english: Can drink lemon tea before and after exercise.
sentences.chinese: 可以飲用檸檬茶，練習前後。

sentences.english: Only then only then drinks in certain characteristic restaurant obtains the lemon tea.
sentences.chinese: 只有在某些特色餐館裏才喝得到檸檬茶。

sentences.english: I like coffee better than lemonade.
sentences.chinese: 和檸檬茶比，我更喜歡咖啡。

sentences.english: I need a large cup of lemon tea, please.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一杯大杯的檸檬茶。

sentences.english: LemonTea was crying in the cage.
I'd like some iced tea with lemon.
sentences.chinese: 我想要一杯檸檬茶，加冰。

sentences.english: Sure, I'd like to have one hot lemon tea.
sentences.chinese: 可以，我想要一杯熱檸檬茶。

sentences.english: I'll have sandwich and lemon tea.
sentences.chinese: 我要一份三明治和檸檬茶。

sentences.english: I fall in love with lemon tea now, it also makes me healthy.
sentences.chinese: 我現在愛上了檸檬茶，那也讓我保持健康。

sentences.english: Please give me a coffee with milk. My wife would like a cup of tea with lemon.
sentences.chinese: 請給我一杯咖啡加牛奶？我的老婆要一杯檸檬茶。

sentences.english: There is nothing as refreshing as lemon tea.
sentences.chinese: 什麼都不如檸檬茶那樣提神。

sentences.english: That morning, Mr. Mill had lean pork and lemon tea as breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 那天早上，米爾先生吃了瘦肉，喝了檸檬茶作爲早餐。

definition: turtle jelly, medicine made with powdered turtle shell and herbs/a similar product made without turtle shell and consumed as a dessert
to reconstitute (a powdered beverage) by adding water, milk etc
